remarks: Reverse distributive law for scalar product operation, using operations from the dual space.  (Contributed by NM, 21-Oct-2014.)
statement:
ldualvsdi2.f $e |- F = ( LFnl ` W ) $.
ldualvsdi2.r $e |- R = ( Scalar ` W ) $.
ldualvsdi2.a $e |- .+ = ( +g ` R ) $.
ldualvsdi2.k $e |- K = ( Base ` R ) $.
ldualvsdi2.d $e |- D = ( LDual ` W ) $.
ldualvsdi2.p $e |- .+b = ( +g ` D ) $.
ldualvsdi2.s $e |- .x. = ( .s ` D ) $.
ldualvsdi2.w $e |- ( ph -> W e. LMod ) $.
ldualvsdi2.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. K ) $.
ldualvsdi2.y $e |- ( ph -> Y e. K ) $.
ldualvsdi2.g $e |- ( ph -> G e. F ) $.
ldualvsdi2 $p |- ( ph -> ( ( X .+ Y ) .x. G ) = ( ( X .x. G ) .+b ( Y .x. G ) ) ) $.
